Depends on user traffic load originating from management zone
Decreased significantly from traffic passing through 2 network layers

ufw uses bash scripting but iptables does not support it
ufw can insert new firewall rules but not iptables
ufw uses 'proto' as a parameter but iptables uses '-p'

questions.question: The ufw command 'sudo ufw delete 4' will..
options: move the previous rule downwards to position 4
remove the 4th and move the 3rd rule downwards to position 4
[]remove the 4th rule and move the 5th rule upwards to position 4
move the 3rd rule and swap it with the 4th rule

They are the simplest and therefore the fastest firewall type

questions.question: What is another name for 'first line of defence'?

options: Control pane used for firewall management

questions.question: What is the primary difference between a Virtual Wire and a Tap interface?

3.0 Gbps as the traffic passes through the other 2 ports
0.0 Gbps as all the ports must work together

options: Only the administrator who set it
Only a superuser, unless it expires by itself after 24 hours
[]Only the administrator who set it or a superuser
